card.name: Adverse Conditions
card.text: Devoid Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step. Put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Akoum Firebird
card.text: Flying, haste Akoum Firebird attacks each turn if able. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {4}{R}{R}. If you do, return Akoum Firebird from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Akoum Hellkite
card.text: Flying Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellkite deals 1 damage to target creature or player. If that land is a Mountain, Akoum Hellkite deals 2 damage to that creature or player instead.

card.name: Akoum Stonewaker
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, put a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste onto the battlefield. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Aligned Hedron Network
card.text: When Aligned Hedron Network enters the battlefield, exile all creatures with power 5 or greater until Aligned Hedron Network leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Ally Encampment
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast an Ally spell. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Ally Encampment: Return target Ally you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Altar's Reap
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Altar's Reap, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

card.name: Angel of Renewal
card.text: Flying When Angel of Renewal enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

card.name: Angelic Captain
card.text: Flying Whenever Angelic Captain attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Ally.

card.name: Angelic Gift
card.text: Enchant creature When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has flying.

card.name: Anticipate
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Bane of Bala Ged
card.text: Whenever Bane of Bala Ged attacks, defending player exiles two permanents he or she controls.

card.name: Barrage Tyrant
card.text: Devoid {2}{R}, Sacrifice another colorless creature: Barrage Tyrant deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.

card.name: Beastcaller Savant
card.text: Haste {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.

card.name: Belligerent Whiptail
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Belligerent Whiptail gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Benthic Infiltrator
card.text: Devoid Ingest Benthic Infiltrator can't be blocked.

card.name: Blight Herder
card.text: When you cast Blight Herder, you may put two cards your opponents own from exile into their owners' graveyards. If you do, put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Blighted Cataract
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Cataract: Draw two cards.

card.name: Blighted Fen
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {4}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Fen: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Blighted Gorge
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Gorge: Blighted Gorge deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Blighted Steppe
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Steppe: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.

card.name: Blighted Woodland
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Woodland: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Blisterpod
card.text: Devoid When Blisterpod dies, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Bloodbond Vampire
card.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbond Vampire.

card.name: Boiling Earth
card.text: Boiling Earth deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Awaken 4-{6}{R}

card.name: Bone Splinters
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Bone Splinters, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

card.name: Breaker of Armies
card.text: All creatures able to block Breaker of Armies do so.

card.name: Brilliant Spectrum
card.text: Converge - Draw X cards, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Brilliant Spectrum. Then discard two cards.

card.name: Bring to Light
card.text: Converge - Search your library for a creature, instant, or sorcery card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast Bring to Light, exile that card, then shuffle your library. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Brood Butcher
card.text: Devoid When Brood Butcher enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool." {B}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.text: Devoid Put two 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Cinder Glade
card.text: Cinder Glade enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

card.text: {4}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.text: Flying When Courier Griffin enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

card.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rot Shambler.

card.text: When you cast Ruin Processor, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, you gain 5 life.

card.name: Ruination Guide
card.text: Devoid Ingest Other colorless creatures you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Ruinous Path
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Awaken 4-{5}{B}{B}

card.name: Rush of Ice
card.text: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Awaken 3-{4}{U}

card.name: Salvage Drone
card.text: Devoid Ingest When Salvage Drone dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Sanctum of Ugin
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. Whenever you cast a colorless spell with converted mana cost 7 or greater, you may sacrifice Sanctum of Ugin. If you do, search your library for a colorless creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Sandstone Bridge
card.text: Sandstone Bridge enters the battlefield tapped. When Sandstone Bridge enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Scatter to the Winds
card.text: Counter target spell. Awaken 3-{4}{U}{U}

card.name: Scour from Existence
card.text: Exile target permanent.

card.name: Scythe Leopard
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Scythe Leopard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Seek the Wilds
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Serene Steward
card.text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Serpentine Spike
card.text: Devoid Serpentine Spike deals 2 damage to target creature, 3 damage to another target creature, and 4 damage to a third target creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Shambling Vent
card.text: Shambling Vent enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. {1}{W}{B}: Shambling Vent becomes a 2/3 white and black Elemental creature with lifelink until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Sheer Drop
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature. Awaken 3-{5}{W}

card.name: Shrine of the Forsaken Gods
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast colorless spells. Activate this ability only if you control seven or more lands.

card.name: Silent Skimmer
card.text: Devoid Flying Whenever Silent Skimmer attacks, defending player loses 2 life.

card.name: Sire of Stagnation
card.text: Devoid Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player exiles the top two cards of his or her library and you draw two cards.

card.name: Skitterskin
card.text: Devoid Skitterskin can't block. {1}{B}: Regenerate Skitterskin. Activate this ability only if you control another colorless creature.

card.name: Skyline Cascade
card.text: Skyline Cascade enters the battlefield tapped. When Skyline Cascade enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Skyrider Elf
card.text: Flying Converge - Skyrider Elf enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.

card.name: Slab Hammer
card.text: Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may return a land you control to its owner's hand. If you do, the creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Equip {2}

card.name: Sludge Crawler
card.text: Devoid Ingest {2}: Sludge Crawler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Smite the Monstrous
card.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Smoldering Marsh
card.text: Smoldering Marsh enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

card.name: Smothering Abomination
card.text: Devoid Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. Whenever you sacrifice a creature, draw a card.

card.name: Snapping Gnarlid
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Snapping Gnarlid gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Spawning Bed
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {6}, {T}, Sacrifice Spawning Bed: Put three 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Spell Shrivel
card.text: Devoid Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Stasis Snare
card.text: Flash When Stasis Snare enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Stasis Snare leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Stone Haven Medic
card.text: {W}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Stonefury
card.text: Stonefury deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

card.name: Sunken Hollow
card.text: Sunken Hollow enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

card.name: Sure Strike
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Swarm Surge
card.text: Devoid Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Colorless creatures you control also gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Swell of Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Sylvan Scrying
card.text: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Tajuru Beastmaster
card.text: Rally - Whenever Tajuru Beastmaster or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Tajuru Stalwart
card.text: Converge - Tajuru Stalwart enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.

card.name: Tajuru Warcaller
card.text: Rally - Whenever Tajuru Warcaller or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Tandem Tactics
card.text: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Territorial Baloth
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Tide Drifter
card.text: Devoid Other colorless creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: Tightening Coils
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -6/-0 and loses flying.

card.name: Titan's Presence
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Titan's Presence, reveal a colorless creature card from your hand. Exile target creature if its power is less than or equal to the revealed card's power.

card.name: Touch of the Void
card.text: Devoid Touch of the Void deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Transgress the Mind
card.text: Devoid Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it with converted mana cost 3 or greater and exile that card.

card.name: Tunneling Geopede
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Tunneling Geopede deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Turn Against
card.text: Devoid Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Ugin's Insight
card.text: Scry X, where X is the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control, then draw three cards.

card.name: Ulamog's Despoiler
card.text: As Ulamog's Despoiler enters the battlefield, you may put two cards your opponents own from exile into their owners' graveyards. If you do, Ulamog's Despoiler enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Ulamog's Nullifier
card.text: Devoid Flash Flying When Ulamog's Nullifier enters the battlefield, you may put two cards your opponents own from exile into their owners' graveyards. If you do, counter target spell.

card.name: Ulamog's Reclaimer
card.text: Devoid When Ulamog's Reclaimer enters the battlefield, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger
card.text: When you cast Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger, exile two target permanents. Indestructible Whenever Ulamog attacks, defending player exiles the top twenty cards of his or her library.

card.name: Undergrowth Champion
card.text: If damage would be dealt to Undergrowth Champion while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from Undergrowth Champion. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Undergrowth Champion.

card.name: Unified Front
card.text: Converge - Put a 1/1 white Kor Ally creature token onto the battlefield for each color of mana spent to cast Unified Front.

card.name: Unnatural Aggression
card.text: Devoid Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. If the creature an opponent controls would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Valakut Invoker
card.text: {8}: Valakut Invoker deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Valakut Predator
card.text: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Valakut Predator gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Vampiric Rites
card.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Veteran Warleader
card.text: Veteran Warleader's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. Tap another untapped Ally you control: Veteran Warleader gains your choice of first strike, vigilance, or trample until end of turn.

card.name: Vile Aggregate
card.text: Devoid Vile Aggregate's power is equal to the number of colorless creatures you control. Trample Ingest

card.name: Void Attendant
card.text: Devoid {1}{G}, Put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard: Put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

card.name: Void Winnower
card.text: Your opponents can't cast spells with even converted mana costs. Your opponents can't block with creatures with even converted mana costs.

card.name: Volcanic Upheaval
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Voracious Null
card.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on Voracious Null. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Wasteland Strangler
card.text: Devoid When Wasteland Strangler enters the battlefield, you may put a card an opponent owns from exile into that player's graveyard. If you do, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Wave-Wing Elemental
card.text: Flying Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Wave-Wing Elemental gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Windrider Patrol
card.text: Flying Whenever Windrider Patrol deals combat damage to a player, scry 2.

card.name: Woodland Wanderer
card.text: Vigilance, trample Converge - Woodland Wanderer enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.

card.name: Zada, Hedron Grinder
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Zada, Hedron Grinder, copy that spell for each other creature you control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

card.name: Zulaport Cutthroat
card.text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
